item.title: Left Resources
item.description: “Struggle so that all may live this rich, overflowing life. And be sure that in this struggle you will find a joy greater than anything else can give.” ― Kropotkin News: Focused on independent news Democracy Now: https://www.democracynow.org/ Real News Network: https://therealnews.com/ Canada Independent Media List (Canada): http://www.independentmedia.ca/ Alternatives Jorunal (Canada): https://www.alternativesjournal.ca/ Alternatives (Canada): https://www.alternatives.ca/en Web: Jacobin: https://jacobinmag.com/ Current Affairs: https://www.currentaffairs.org/ Marxism: https://marxist.ca/ Anti-MRAs and Gender Rights: http://www.wehuntedthemammoth.com/ Black Socialists of America: https://blacksocialists.
